verses.content: Sigionoth chunga zâwlnei Habak- kuk ṭawngṭaina chu:
Aw LALPA, i ṭawng ka hriet a,ka ṭi tah a; Aw LALPA, hieng kumhai sûng hin i sinthaw chu hung sukhar rawh. Kumhai laia hin hung inhriettir la, Lunginsennaa khawm zângaina chu hre zing rawh.
Pathien chu Temana inthawkina hung a. Mi Inthieng chu Paran tlânga inthawkin. A ropuina chun vânhai chu ân khum a, Leihnuoi chu ân pâknain a sip a nih.
A êngna chu var ang a na; A kuta inthawk chun varkêhai a hung suok a, A thilthawtheina inbîkna chu a um a nih.
A hmaa chun hri chu a feh a; A kehaia inthawk chun meiling inling a fe suok a.
A ngîr a, hnuoi chu ân hnîng a; Hnamhai chu a en a, a hnawt dar tah a; Kumkhaw tlânghai khawm chu sukdarin an um a, Chatuon muolhai chu an kûn bawk a; A lampuihai chu chatuona mi an nih.
Kushan puon inhai chu sukrimsika a um lai kahmuh a; Midian ram puonzârhai chu ân thin a.

LALPA chu vadunghai chungachun a lungawi naw am anih? Vadunghai chunga chun i lunginsenna chu a umin, Tuisuoriet chunga chun i lunginsenna chu a um am a nih? I sakawrhai chunga chun i chuongin, I sandamna sakawr tawlailîr- haia chun i chuong hi?
I thalngul chu sukruok dêr ana; Thalhai chu a hruiah înbûk a, Nang chun leihnuoi chu vadunghaiin i thlêr tah a.
Tlânghai chun an hmu cheh a,an ṭih a; Tui insawkhai khawm chu an fe hmang tah a; Li inthûk chun a râwl ânsuoh a, A kuthai chu chungtieng a phar a.
Nisa le thla chu an umnaachun an ngîr zing a, I thalhai kâp suoka umhai vara le, I fei tle zawr zawr vara chun.
Lunginthakin ram chu i fethleng a, Lunginsenin hnamhai chu i chîl hrep a.
I mihai sandamna dingin i fesuok a, I hriek nâl sandamna ding chun. Mi rilo sûngkuoa inthawk chun lu chu i sukhliem a, Ring chenin a lungphûm chu i suklang tah a.
A indo mihai lu chu amahmawl ngei chun i sun- thleng a, Kei mi sukdar dingin thlivir angin an hung a: An hlimna chu mi rimsi chu inrûka fâk hmang chu a nih.
I sakawrhai le chun tuisuoriet chu i chîl tah a, Tui nasatak umkhâwmhaichu.

Ka hriet a, ka phîngsûng chuân thin a, Ka hmûrhai chu râwlria chun ân thin hlawp hlawp a; Ka ruhaia chun hmawnna a hung lût a, chuongchun, ka hmuna chun kân thin a nih; Buoina nia chun châwl kata, Mipui, sipai pâwl anga mi rûntu chunga an hung tlung pha chun.

Theichang kûng chu pâr naw sien khawm, Grêphruia chun a ra um naw bawk sien khawm; Oliv leia sin inrimna chu hung thlâwnin, Lohai chun bu insuo naw bawk hai sien; Berâm ruol chu a ina inthawka sât thlâka umin, Bâwng ina chun bâwng ruol khawm um naw bawk hai sien khawm,
LALPAA chun hlim ka ta, Ka sandamna Pathiena chun lâwm ka tih.
Lalpa, Jehova chu ka hrâtna a na, Ka kehai chu sazukpui kehai angin a siem a, Ama chun ka bâwlhmunhaia chun mîn fetir a tih.
